welcome: Welcome to Real Time Bus. This bot will help you to find the best route you need. Enjoy It
serviceUnavailable: There is no service available for your location yet. We do apologize
currentLocation: Your current location is: #display_name#. There are services available #emoji#
newroteMsg: If you want to search a new rote, click in cancel to return to the previous menu
routeInfo: Real Time information for this route
thanksMsg: Thanks for using this bot. You will be very welcome in the future. #emoji#
askUpdateLocale: Before bring stops near you, would you like to update your address?
busStopAvailableNearMe: Bus stops available near your location
